Title: Relates to establishing standards of regulation to permit familial searching and partial DNA matches as an investigative tool in certain unsolved crimes
Summary: Establishes standards of regulation to permit familial searching and partial DNA matches as an investigative tool in certain unsolved crimes; includes further definitions, reporting criteria and penalties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing standards of regulation to permit familial searching and partial DNA matches as an investigative tool in certain unsolved crimes
